name: Scalvage
description:
Use your ship's Tractor Beam (Shift/X) to sling mines at drifting debris to find the parts you need to get home.

Collect a stronger engine, a hyperdrive core, shield generator, and cannons before the blackhole sucks you in.

CONTROLS: (Gamepad/Keyboard)
Engines:  Up /W
Rotate:  Left&Right/A&D
TractorBeam:  RT/Left Shift
Shoot (item):  A/Space

Programming
